name: LearnLM 2.0 Flash Experimental
description: Experimental education-focused model based on Gemini 2.0 Flash, trained to align with learning science principles. Optimized for teaching and learning use cases.
notes: EXPERIMENTAL - Free via Google AI Studio. Based on Gemini 2.0 Flash with education-specific tuning. Follows five learning science principles: active learning, cognitive load management, learner adaptation, curiosity stimulation, and metacognition. Preferred by expert pedagogical raters over GPT-4o (31%), Claude 3.5 Sonnet (11%), and base Gemini 1.5 Pro (13%). Ideal for educational content, tutoring, and personalized learning experiences.
